title: Bewitching Evelynn [Skin Concept]

embed.description: Skin idea for new Evelynn :3 Bewitching Evelynn

body:
Halloween skin idea for new Evelynn 
hope you like it :3

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=K4z4wxmn,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-10-09T20:08:40.627+0000)
>
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

We love the popstar Eve, but really Bewitching Eve makes more sense than anything
They could call it "All Hallows Eve"

this is so wonderful!!!! All Hallow's Eve was a great name idea from someone else!
I'm kinda sad that they might not make it simply because tango is super purple in game and they wouldn't want to make another one that comes close to it =(

Love it.
I feel as though there's a LITTLE bit too much skin than I'd like. Evelynn's known for being seductive, but that may be a bit too much. Nonetheless, still wonderful.
The sad thing about her vgu is that now I want every skin idea to be made. My wallet canâ€™t handle it.
it looks cool but man , give her more cloths , I don't like how people consider as a " whore "
